scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix overlay"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run build --prefix overlay"
scripts.preview: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run preview --prefix overlay"
scripts.serve: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run build --prefix overlay && npm run preview --prefix overlay"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix overlay
